content.raw:
I’d really recommend considering the URI scheme that I proposed [in the comments](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GAZ/pages/35740/Gazebo+X?focusedCommentId=477822977#comment-477822977). I’m pretty sure it would make it **very** simple to parse the frame input strings, and also be more short and concise for users who are writing SDF files.

If we’re open to considering that scheme I’d be happy to whip up an implementation and open a PR.
content.html:
I’d really recommend considering the URI scheme that I proposed in the comments. I’m pretty sure it would make it very simple to parse the frame input strings, and also be more short and concise for users who are writing SDF files.

If we’re open to considering that scheme I’d be happy to whip up an implementation and open a PR.
